name: Victory March HD Free
description:
Probably one of the best games for the iPad.

Victory March HD Free is an action WW2 themed sideway runner game. In Victory March HD Free, you play as a Soviet or as an American soldier. Your goal is to run forward and jump from one platform to another. Our fearless heroes are fighting hordes of enemies.

Some of the features of Victory March:

- simple and addictive gameplay
- awesome 3D graphics
- 2 gameplay modes
- Game Center support (leaderboards and achievements)

Enjoy Victory March HD Free!
